p: In order to identify the active antifungal components of the pistachio hull EO, MICs and MFCs were also determined with α-pinene, α-terpineol, camphene, D-limonene and 3-carene as well as the mix of these compounds at the concentrations found in the EO against C. albicans strain 16, C. glabrata strain 9 and C. parapsilosis strain 26.
